nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels: Strike Missions is a free online Star Wars Rebels browser game developed by Disney Interactive. The game was released on Disney.com and StarWars.com on October 14, 2015 and features various characters from Star Wars Rebels Season Two.
Help Ezra, Zeb, Hera, Sabine, and Kanan strike back against Imperial forces in this action adventure game.

The team tracks a transmission to an imperial star destroyer, and attempts to free a prisoner they think is on board. However, it turns out to be a trap set by Kallus. Once they escape, they follow the transmission to an imperial base, where they confront Kallus after realizing once again that they were simply lured to a trap.
